name: JobsTAXI
overview:
JobsTAXI is a web 2.0 jobs portal that takes you to the jobs you want.

Which means, with our dynamic features, we create the easiest, no frills experience in job searching and jobs postings for both the employers and the jobseekers. JobsTAXI is developed as a newer, more powerful platform that brings the success of Hot Jobs Center( a global recruitment portal, in partnership with Aquent in 2007) to another level.

So What Makes JobsTAXI Different?

Innovative Features that makes YOUR job search easier.

JobsTAXI has revolutionary features that make searching for jobs easier and fun. Live Search allows jobs searches to be open ended. Just type in any keyword and we’ll get you a list of jobs that you’re looking for, on the very same page. The â€œSaved Searchesâ€ function allows users to save and manage their unique search keywords. There’s also an â€œAuto Showâ€ function that allows jobs of a chosen keyword to be shown on your return visit to JobsTAXI. Email updates will also be sent whenever a new job that matches your keyword is posted. We’ve added the search bar across every jobs posting, so you can search for jobs without leaving the same page.

What We Are Not.

Unlike other online job portals, there are no categories and unnecessary classifications to organize job postings. JobsTAXI thrives on open ended searches using keywords and tags. This allows a faster search with higher relevancy. We’re also much easier to use unlike most jobsites with our uncluttered interface. Every job, like you, is unique. Just type in anything you like and we’ll deliver like-minded employers right away.

Three Click To Post. One Click To Apply.

Employers can get a job posted in three clicks and jobseekers can get to a job in one click. We’ve spent much time tweaking our system and we’ve created a workflow for both jobseekers and employers that’s simple, quick and very easy to use. The best part is, you don’t have to create an account to apply for the jobs.
